Find a Job

If you're currently seeking employment opportunities, join us on Tuesday, May 6th, 2025, for the Job Fair of the Carolinas. The event will be held from 10:00 AM to 1:00 PM at Carowinds on the Grove. See you there!

Click here for this year's event information.  

The Bennettsville SC Works Center will be closed on April 10th and April 11th. The center will reopen on Monday, April 14, 2025, at 8:30 AM.
